review_text: App crashes every time I try to open my profile page. Using iPhone 14 with iOS 17.2. Version 3.2.1 is completely broken after the latest update.
Absolutely love this app! The new UI redesign is beautiful and intuitive. Best productivity app I've ever used. Five stars!
Please add dark mode support. I use the app at night and the bright white screen is killing my eyes. Would be nice to have a toggle in settings.
This is terrible! I paid $9.99 for premium and the sync feature hasn't worked for 3 weeks. Waste of money. I want a refund immediately!

The app is okay but slow on my Samsung Galaxy S21 with Android 13. Takes about 10 seconds to load the dashboard. Could use some optimization.
Great job on the latest update! The search feature is lightning fast now. Thank you for listening to user feedback. Highly recommend!
Login keeps failing with error code 403. I've tried resetting my password three times on iOS 16.5. Can't access my account at all since version 3.2.0.
Good app overall. Would love to see integration with Google Calendar and Slack. The ability to export reports as PDF would also be super helpful.
App freezes randomly during video calls. Have to force close and restart. Happens at least 3 times a day on my Android 14 device. Very annoying glitch.
This app has genuinely improved my workflow. The team collaboration features are fantastic. Wonderful experience overall!
All my saved projects disappeared after the update to 3.2.1! Months of work gone. This is unacceptable data loss. I had important files stored there.
The UI is clean but I wish there was an option to customize the dashboard layout. Also, adding widget support would make this app perfect.

Solid app for team management. Would be great to have SSO integration and admin role management. The current permission system is too basic.
Black screen bug on startup since updating to 3.2.1. Have to close and reopen 5-6 times before it loads properly. Using Pixel 6 with Android 13.
Impressed by the performance improvements in this update. Everything feels smooth and responsive. The developers clearly care about quality.
Horrible experience. The onboarding tutorial is confusing and misleading. Took me 30 minutes to figure out basic features. Very frustrating app.
Please add support for offline mode. I travel frequently and need to access my data without internet. Also would love Notion integration.
Been using this app for 2 years. It keeps getting better. The recent file sharing feature is excellent. Good job team!
Critical crash when uploading files larger than 10MB. App immediately force closes. Tested on Galaxy S23 with Android 14. Happens every single time.
Perfect. Simple. Clean. Does exactly what I need without unnecessary bloat. Love the minimalist design approach. Recommend to everyone!
Would love end-to-end encryption for shared documents. Security is important. Also consider adding two-factor authentication option.
Worst app update ever. You completely ruined the navigation. Everything is harder to find now. The old layout was much better. Ridiculous decision.
Really helpful for organizing my coursework. The tagging system is intuitive. Suggestion: add a Pomodoro timer feature for study sessions.
Sync between my phone and tablet is completely broken. Changes I make on one device don't appear on the other. Very unreliable since v3.2.0.
Thank you for fixing the notification bug from last update! Everything works perfectly now. This is why I love this development team.

Please improve screen reader support. The app is almost great but several buttons are unlabeled. Also need better contrast options for low vision users.
I'm furious about the premium pricing change. You increased the price by 50% with no new features. Feels like a scam. Lost all trust in this company.
